constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission 22/02394/HOU (Erection of two storey side and rear wrap around extension.  Erection of rail guard on front balcony, installation of 1no rear rooflight in existing loft. Alteration to fenestration). Amendment to consist of alterations to fenestrations on west elevation, alterations to the proposed finish to flat roof at rear, alterations to the materials of the proposed rear windows, and installation of elevated planters at ground and lower ground floor in place of the erection of safety rails
decision_conditions: The proposed roof would contradict with Condition 4 of the planning permission, which restricts the use of the flat roof, therefore, the Council considers the amendments not to be non-material and as such, the application is refused.
